author: MSNBC
title: BP to offload stake in Russia’s Rosneft, cites invasion of Ukraine
description: British energy giant BP announced Sunday it was offloading its 19.75 percent stake in Rosneft, a Russian-controlled oil company.
content:
British energy giant BP announced Sunday it was offloading its 19.75 percent stake in Rosneft, a Russian-controlled oil company.
